thread.title: New Continuum Data Centers Adds Twenty-one New Logos

author: Tom Chaffin
title: New Continuum Data Centers Adds Twenty-one New Logos
text:
Data center operator New Continuum Holdings Corporation (“New Continuum”) is pleased to announce its most successful period of sales growth since inception. New Continuum added 21 new customers in the 3 months ended August 31, 2015, representing significant acceleration in its sales activities. New Continuum operates an 80,000 square foot, purpose-built, multi-tenant data center in the western Chicago suburbs. Its West Chicago facility boasts extremely robust infrastructure, and is operated by a team with unparalleled depth of experience. “We believe customers have recognized both the unique strength of our facility and the unique strength of our team,” said Eli D. Scher, Chairman and CEO. “Our recent sales acceleration is evidence of the market’s recognition of our superior product, and our commitment to exceeding customer expectations.” New Continuum has invested aggressively in its product to ensure that it can deliver the most flexible solutions in the industry. With third party commissioning by Primary Integration Services, PCI compliance , SSAE 16, HIPAA and Open-IX certification, New Continuum can address the requirements of the most discerning and demanding data center users. New Continuum’s custom designed building management and automation systems provide superior monitoring, tracking and trending capabilities resulting in extreme transparency and efficiency. “Our product can accommodate extremely high power density cabinet footprints and unique connectivity requirements, while still delivering exceptional value,” added Scher. “We look forward to supporting these new customers along with our existing customers and future customers as their mission critical requirements expand.”
About New Continuum
New Continuum Data Centers (“NCDC”) is a multi-tenant data center operator in the western Chicago suburbs. NCDC operates an 80,000 square foot, purpose-built, Tier III+ facility in West Chicago, IL. NCDC offers highly flexible colocation services to both large enterprises and small businesses. New Continuum’s products range from basic colocation to private cages, private suites and secured data halls. Additionally, New Continuum offers unique connectivity and peering solutions through its partnership with United IX ( http://www.unitedix.net ). New Continuum’s 2N power design can accommodate some of the highest density cabinet footprints, and with its efficient technologies and robust cooling infrastructure it can deliver leading edge PUEs. The New Continuum team has the experience and expertise to manage the needs of a diverse customer base. To learn more about New Continuum, please visit http://www.newcontinuum.net , or call 877-432-2656.
